name: Moon Passage
description:
Moon Passage is a Doodle Jump style platformer. 

You play as Ranger, a girl who lives on the moon. Her ship was hit by an asteroid and now she needs your help to get home before her oxygen runs out. You get one shot.

This is my first time participating in a game jam. I started learning Unity in July of this year. It has been a great experience so far.

All art and music were originally made for this project.
